full_summary:
# Pressure Transmitter and Strainer Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking bids for the procurement of Pressure Transmitter and Strainer items.

## Items Description
The following items are to be procured:

| Item # | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1    | Pressure Transmitter, 0-600 PSI | 8      | EA          |
| 2    | Pressure Transmitter, 0-600 PSI | 6      | EA          |
| 3    | Strainer, Sediment | 8      | EA          |
| 4    | Strainer, Sediment | 6      | EA          |

## Delivery
Delivery is required to the following locations:

* CFB Esquimalt
* CFB Halifax

## Specification
* GSIN: 5820, NSN: 20-A0U-5799 for Pressure Transmitters
* GSIN: 4730, NSN: 20-A0W-6489 for Strainers
* Brand Name and Model, or Part Number and NCAGE must be specified for Equivalent or Substitute products

## Tender Terms
* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* Foreign currency bids will be rejected
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in English or French

## Tender Documents
Tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8362/rfp-w8482-241972-a-en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8362/rfp-w8482-241972-a-fr.pdf

## Contact Information
For questions or further information, please contact Jean-Pierre Normandin at:

Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (819) 939-3674

## Tender Closing Date
Tender closing date is October 3, 2023, at 14:00:00.

Note: I removed all the unnecessary information and reworded the text to make it more concise and professional. The rewritten text includes the important details of the tender announcement, and is formatted in a clear and easy-to-read manner. Additionally, I corrected the grammar and spelling errors in the original
